document.full_text: slipknot have decided to stay "within the family" to find a touring replacement for bassist paul gray, who died of an accidental overdose last may.
document.title: slipknot recruits co-founder to replace bassist
lines_and_colors: slipknot have decided to stay "within the family" to find a touring replacement for bassist paul gray, who died of an accidental overdose last may.
